title: ISic020767. ISic020767
body:
Facsimile Images

ρατορϝε
ratorve

Apparatus criticus

Text after Agostiniani, in Agostiniani, Albanese Procelli 2018.

English translation

Italian translation

commentary

The onomastic basis of this anthroponym can be seen in the name ρατορα of the pair of inscriptions (ρατορα; αρακακαμι) on the Attic black-glazed cup of tomb East 31 from Montagna di Marzo (ISic020745), and could be also identified, as noted by Arena, IGASM 2[2], p. 82 and Agostiniani (2018, 195) in one of the names, ῾Ρατορο̄́, mentioned by a defixio from Palermo (Arena, IGASM 2[2], no. 118, l. 3; ISic030025).

bibliography

    Agostiniani Forthcoming MMA 63 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002519
    Agostiniani, Albanese Procelli 2018 196, fig. 22 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001345
